languages.text: "Визит на Кьяву Гамма не дал ответы на все вопросы, но нам удалось нанести удар культу, уничтожив машину {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензора{/g}. Я направил усилия своих соглядатаев на выслеживание уцелевших предводителей секты — уверен, в скором времени они предоставят нам ценные данные. Это небольшая, но победа для {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g} — победа, за которую я благодарю тебя, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Собранных на Кьява Гамма данных достаточно, чтобы направить агентов по следу остальных предводителей Культа. Это небольшая, но победа для Золотого трона — победа, за которую я благодарю тебя, {name}". {n}Хейнрикс склоняет голову.{/n} "Едва ли мне удалось бы достать эти данные без твоего содействия".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"
languages.original_text: "Визит на Кьяву Гамма не дал ответы на все вопросы, но нам удалось нанести удар культу, уничтожив машину {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензора{/g}. Я направил усилия своих соглядатаев на выслеживание уцелевших предводителей секты — уверен, в скором времени они предоставят нам ценные данные. Это небольшая, но победа для {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g} — победа, за которую я благодарю тебя, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the Fabricator's machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the Golden Throne, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the Fabricator's machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"

I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the Golden Throne, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “基亚瓦伽马星这场旅途并没让我找到所有问题的答案，但我们确实摧毁了{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}的机器，对邪教进行了打击。我已经指示我的线人继续追查教派剩余的领袖，我相信他们很快就会为我们带来有用的线索。虽然这只是小小的一步，但这确实是{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的胜利。这一切都得感谢你，{name}！”
languages.original_text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: “基亚瓦伽马星这场旅途并没让我找到所有问题的答案，但我们确实摧毁了{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}的机器，对邪教进行了打击。我已经指示我的线人继续追查教派剩余的领袖，我相信他们很快就会为我们带来有用的线索。虽然这只是小小的一步，但这确实是{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的胜利。这一切都得感谢你，{name}！”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the Fabricator-Censor's machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the Golden Throne, and I have you to thank for it, !"

languages.text: «Mi visita a Kiava Gamma no ha respondido a todas mis preguntas, pero conseguimos asestar un buen golpe al culto al destruir la máquina del {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g}. He ordenado a mis espías encontrar a los líderes restantes de la secta; no tardarán en proporcionarnos información útil. Aunque pequeña, esta es una victoria para el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}, ¡y se la debo a usted, {name}!».
languages.original_text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi visita a Kiava Gamma no ha respondido a todas mis preguntas, pero conseguimos asestar un buen golpe al culto al destruir la máquina del {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g}. He ordenado a mis espías encontrar a los líderes restantes de la secta; no tardarán en proporcionarnos información útil. Aunque pequeña, esta es una victoria para el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}, ¡y se la debo a usted, {name}!».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマへの訪問では、すべての疑問に対する答えを得ることはできなかったが、{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}のマシンを破壊することで、教団に打撃を与えることには成功した。スパイに、教団の生き残りのリーダーを追跡するよう指示した。必ずや、有益な情報をもたらしてくれるだろう。ささやかではあるが、これは{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の勝利だ。あなたに感謝しなければならんな、{name}！」
languages.original_text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマへの訪問では、すべての疑問に対する答えを得ることはできなかったが、{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}のマシンを破壊することで、教団に打撃を与えることには成功した。スパイに、教団の生き残りのリーダーを追跡するよう指示した。必ずや、有益な情報をもたらしてくれるだろう。ささやかではあるが、これは{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の勝利だ。あなたに感謝しなければならんな、{name}！」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Besuch auf Kiava Gamma konnte nicht alle meine Fragen beantworten, doch es ist uns gelungen, dem Kult einen schweren Schlag zu versetzen, indem wir die Maschine des {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censors{/g} zerstört haben. Ich habe meine Spione angewiesen, die überlebenden Anführer der Sekte aufzuspüren. Sie werden gewiss bald nützliche Informationen für uns haben. Es ist zwar ein kleiner Sieg, doch es ist ein Sieg für den {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g}, und wir haben ihn Euch zu verdanken, {name}!"
languages.original_text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: "Mein Besuch auf Kiava Gamma konnte nicht alle meine Fragen beantworten, doch es ist uns gelungen, dem Kult einen schweren Schlag zu versetzen, indem wir die Maschine des {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censors{/g} zerstört haben. Ich habe meine Spione angewiesen, die überlebenden Anführer der Sekte aufzuspüren. Sie werden gewiss bald nützliche Informationen für uns haben. Es ist zwar ein kleiner Sieg, doch es ist ein Sieg für den {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g}, und wir haben ihn Euch zu verdanken, {name}!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Bon nombre de questions sont restées sans réponse après ma visite sur Kiava Gamma, mais nous avons néanmoins porté un coup au culte en détruisant la machine du {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g}. J'ai envoyé mes espions sur la piste des leaders survivants de la secte, je suis sûr qu'ils auront bientôt des informations utiles à nous transmettre. Quoi qu'il en soit, si nous avons pu remporter cette victoire pour le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, aussi nuancée soit-elle, c'est grâce à vous, {name} ! »
languages.original_text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: « Bon nombre de questions sont restées sans réponse après ma visite sur Kiava Gamma, mais nous avons néanmoins porté un coup au culte en détruisant la machine du {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g}. J'ai envoyé mes espions sur la piste des leaders survivants de la secte, je suis sûr qu'ils auront bientôt des informations utiles à nous transmettre. Quoi qu'il en soit, si nous avons pu remporter cette victoire pour le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, aussi nuancée soit-elle, c'est grâce à vous, {name} ! »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Kiava Gama ziyaretimde tüm sorularımın cevabını alamadım. Gelgelelim {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün{/g} makinesini yok ederek tarikata zarar verdiğimiz muhakkak. Casuslarımı tarikatın sağ kalan önderlerinin peşine saldım. Yakında kıymetli bilgilerle döneceklerinden eminim. Bu, küçük de olsa {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} için bir zaferdir. Sana da teşekkürü borç bilirim {name}!"
languages.original_text: "My visit to Kiava Gamma did not produce answers to all my questions, but we did succeed in dealing a blow to the cult by destroying the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine. I have directed my spies to track the sect's surviving leaders — I am certain that they will have useful information for us soon. Though small, this is a victory for the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, and I have you to thank for it, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama ziyaretimde tüm sorularımın cevabını alamadım fakat {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör{/g}'ün makinesini yok ederek tarikata zarar verdiğimiz muhakkak. Casuslarımı tarikatın sağ kalan önderlerinin peşine saldım. Yakında kıymetli bilgilerle döneceklerinden eminim. Bu, küçük de olsa {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} için bir zaferdir ve sana teşekkürü borç bilirim {name}!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
